title: Golden syrup date upside down cake
ingredients: ['300g stoned dates, chopped', '110g golden syrup', '110g butter', '180g soft brown sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150ml milk', '240g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon ground ginger']
